page.title: 09A Home to Live in.
page.content: We were invited to look around a semi- detached family house in Budleigh Salterton to see what amenities there were.We listed some of the more important things in the house which made life more comfortable for the occupants. {General}The inside walls were painted or papered and the floors were carpetted.Each room had electric light and power points. {Lounge}Colour television set,telephone and electric fire. {Kitchen }Electric oven,electric washing machine and a small gas boiler which provided hot water and heating. {Bathroom}Bath,basin,airing cupboard with tiled walls. {Toilet}Flushing toilet with tiled floor.
